title: SkillMetadata
description: Parsed skill metadata from SKILL.md YAML frontmatter.

authors.description: Authors who created or maintain this skill.

description.description: Human-readable description of the skill's purpose.

intents.description: Intents this skill can handle (for intent-based routing).

permissions.description:
Permissions required by this skill (e.g., "filesystem:read", "network:http")
Zero Trust: Empty permissions means NO access to any capabilities.

repository.description: Repository URL for the skill source code.

require_refs.description: Paths to required reference files or skills.

routing_keywords.description: Keywords used for semantic routing and skill selection.

ReferencePath.description: A validated relative path to a reference document (md, pdf, txt, html, json, yaml, yml).
